articles.description: Apart from the revised FAME II subsidies, some state governments have also introduced their own incentives based on battery capacity, and discounts or complete exemption on payment of road tax.
articles.content: The medium term sales trajectory for two wheelers, which include e-two wheelers as well, is anticipated to be modest, characterised by uncertainties and driven by a host of factors, it said. In its r… [+3574 chars]

articles.title: South Indian Bank Block Deal: Stock jumps 10% after shares change hands - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Over 12 crore shares of the lender changed hands in the session on Friday. The buyers and sellers in the deal are not known.
